duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and develop digital electronic circuits, microprocessors, and FPGA systems for electronic devices.
Create embedded software for microprocessor-based systems and ensure integration with hardware components.
Utilize Xilinx tools and platforms for FPGA design and implementation.
Use software tools such as MATLAB/Simulink, Altium, and LTspice for circuit simulation and analysis.
Bachelor’s degree in Electrical Engineering and 6 or more years of electronic circuit design experience.
Conduct research and development to innovate new electronic designs and solutions.
